title: A Barista's Heart: Morning Latte Art
prompt: (masterpiece), best quality, highly detailed, original illustration, 2D Anime style, cinematic lighting, 16:9 aspect ratio. A cute anime girl, solo, professional barista, medium shot, brown hair tied in a ponytail, wearing a white uniform shirt and a beige apron. She is focused, skillfully pouring steamed milk from a metal pitcher, creating a perfect heart latte art design in a white ceramic cup. Warm, cozy coffee shop interior background, soft morning sunlight streaming from a large window, subtle steam rising, wooden counter, blurred bokeh background details.
